jobActions.name: Bootshine
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 210.
Leaden Fist Potency: 310
Opo-opo Form Bonus: Guarantees a critical hit
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.
Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: True Strike
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Can only be executed when in raptor form.
Additional Effect: Changes form to coeurl
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Snap Punch
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.
310 when executed from a target's flank.
Can only be executed when in coeurl form.
Additional Effect: Changes form to opo-opo
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Meditation
jobActions.effect:
Opens a chakra. Up to five chakra can be opened at once.
Opens all five chakra when used outside of combat.
Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution.
Conversely, execution of weaponskills triggers the cooldown of this action.

※Action changes to The Forbidden Chakra when all five chakra are open.

jobActions.name: Steel Peak
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 180.
Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.
Shares a recast timer with Howling Fist.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Twin Snakes
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.
Can only be executed when in raptor form.
Additional Effect: Grants Disciplined Fist
Disciplined Fist Effect: Increases damage dealt by 15%
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Changes form to coeurl
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Arm of the Destroyer
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby targets.
Opo-opo Form Potency: 110
Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Demolish
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 70.
130 when executed from a target's rear.
Can only be executed when in coeurl form.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 70
Duration: 18s
Additional Effect: Changes form to opo-opo
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Rockbreaker
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all nearby enemies.
Can only be executed when in coeurl form.
Additional Effect: Changes form to opo-opo
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Thunderclap
jobActions.effect:
Rush to a targeted enemy's or party member's location.
Maximum Charges: 3
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Howling Fist
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.
Shares a recast timer with The Forbidden Chakra.

jobActions.name: Mantra
jobActions.effect:
Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10% for self and nearby party members.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Four-point Fury
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Can only be executed when in raptor form.
Additional Effect: Grants Disciplined Fist
Disciplined Fist Effect: Increases damage dealt by 15%
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Changes form to coeurl
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Dragon Kick
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 320.
Opo-opo Form Bonus: Grants Leaden Fist
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Perfect Balance
jobActions.effect:
Grants 3 stacks of Perfect Balance, each stack allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Opo-opo Chakra, Coeurl Chakra, or Raptor Chakra depending on the form required by actions executed
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed while in combat and when not under the effect of any Beast Chakra.

jobActions.name: Form Shift
jobActions.effect:
Grants Formless Fist to self, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form.
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.

jobActions.name: The Forbidden Chakra
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 340.
Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.
Shares a recast timer with Enlightenment.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Masterful Blitz
jobActions.effect:
Strike the enemy with a technique fueled by the power of your Beast Chakra.
The technique used is determined by the number of different types of Beast Chakra opened.
1 Beast Chakra Type: Elixir Field
2 Beast Chakra Types: Celestial Revolution
3 Beast Chakra Types: Rising Phoenix
3 Beast Chakra and Both Nadi: Phantom Rush

jobActions.name: Elixir Field
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Opens the Lunar Nadi
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of three of the same Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Flint Strike
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Opens the Solar Nadi
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of three distinct Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Celestial Revolution
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 450.
Additional Effect: Opens the Lunar Nadi
If the Lunar Nadi is already open, opens the Solar Nadi instead.
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of three Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Tornado Kick
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 850 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Lunar Nadi and Solar Nadi, as well as three Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Riddle of Earth
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by 20%.
Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Grants Earth's Reply upon taking damage
Earth's Reply Effect: Gradually restores HP
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Riddle of Fire
jobActions.effect:
Increases damage dealt by 15%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Brotherhood
jobActions.effect:
Grants Brotherhood and Meditative Brotherhood to self and all nearby party members.
Brotherhood Effect: Increases damage dealt by 5%
Meditative Brotherhood Effect: 20% chance you open a chakra when party members under this effect successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell
Chance is 100% when you successfully land a weaponskill or cast a spell while under the effect of Meditative Brotherhood.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Riddle of Wind
jobActions.effect:
Reduces auto-attack delay by 50%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Enlightenment
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Can only be executed while in combat and under the effect of the Fifth Chakra. The five chakra close upon execution.
Shares a recast timer with The Forbidden Chakra.

jobActions.name: Anatman
jobActions.effect:
Extends the duration of Disciplined Fist and your present form to maximum and halts their expiration.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution. Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.

jobActions.name: Six-sided Star
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 550.
Additional Effect: Increases movement speed
Duration: 5s
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions. Upon execution, the recast timer for this action will be applied to all other weaponskills and magic actions.

jobActions.name: Shadow of the Destroyer
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all nearby enemies.
Opo-opo Form Bonus: Guarantees a critical hit
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.
Additional Effect: Changes form to raptor
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Rising Phoenix
jobActions.effect:
Deals physical fire damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 700 for the first enemy, and 70% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Opens the Solar Nadi
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of three distinct Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

jobActions.name: Phantom Rush
jobActions.effect:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,150 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Formless Fist, allowing the execution of a weaponskill that requires a certain form, without being in that form
Duration: 30s
Any additional effects associated with the executed action will also be applied.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Lunar Nadi and Solar Nadi, as well as three Beast Chakra.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.name: Second Wind
roleActions.effect:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 500

roleActions.name: Bloodbath
roleActions.effect:
Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.
Duration: 20s

roleActions.name: Feint
roleActions.effect:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.effect:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: True North
roleActions.effect:
Nullifies all action direction requirements.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Greased Lightning
traits.effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 5%.

traits.name: Enhanced Greased Lightning
traits.effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 10%.

traits.name: Deep Meditation
traits.effect: Grants an 80% chance that a chakra will open upon dealing critical damage with a weaponskill.

traits.name: Enhanced Greased Lightning II
traits.effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.

traits.name: Steel Peak Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Steel Peak to The Forbidden Chakra.

traits.name: Enhanced Perfect Balance
traits.effect:
When under the effect of Perfect Balance, grants Beast Chakra in accordance with the form normally required to execute weaponskills.
Weaponskills requiring opo-opo form grant Opo-opo Chakra.
Weaponskills requiring coeurl form grant Coeurl Chakra.
Weaponskills requiring raptor form grant Raptor Chakra.

traits.name: Deep Meditation II
traits.effect: Guarantees that a chakra will open upon dealing critical damage with a weaponskill.

traits.name: Enhanced Greased Lightning III
traits.effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 20%. Also improves Disciplined Fist's damage increase to 15%.

traits.name: Arm of the Destroyer Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Arm of the Destroyer to Shadow of the Destroyer.

traits.name: Enhanced Thunderclap
traits.effect: Allows a third charge of Thunderclap.

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.effect: Increases the potency of Bootshine to 210, True Strike to 300, Snap Punch to 250, Twin Snakes to 280, Demolish to 70, Dragon Kick to 320, The Forbidden Chakra to 340, and Six-sided Star to 550.

traits.name: Flint Strike Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Flint Strike to Rising Phoenix.

traits.name: Enhanced Brotherhood
traits.effect: Guarantees that a chakra will open when you are under the effect of Meditative Brotherhood and execute a weaponskill or cast a spell.

traits.name: Tornado Kick Mastery
traits.effect: Upgrades Tornado Kick to Phantom Rush.
